page.title: 18Rodbourne - Angrove Farm
page.content: { {Angrove Farm}is 1.50km N.E.of{ {Rodbourne.}The farm is in a hollow and is farmed by {Mr. and Mrs Parfitt }and their two sons . It is 204 acres of grassland and they keep between 120 and 230 beef cattle.They cut just under 80 acres of silage and a few acres of hay and the rest of the grass is for grazing. They do not farm the land intensively because they do not want the land to get tired. They put 2 cwt of complete fertiliser per acre on the 80 acres of grassland on low ground near the river. They use 4 cwt per acre on the grass cut for silage. More cattle are kept in winter than summer. It has been a bad winter and a wet spring this year.{Market price for {beef is Â£50 per cwt.}Their beef cattle sell for between Â£300 and Â£550 each.
